protocol.name: P-MTAB-19105
protocol.text: Seeds were sown on MS medium (Murashige and Skoog 1962). Plantlets grown for 8 days at 20ï¿½C in a growth chamber were then transferred to Jiffy pots (Jiffy France, Lyon, France) and grown for 3 weeks at 22ï¿½C in short day conditions (10 h/14 h light/dark) under constant light at 500 ï¿½E s-1 m-2. After hrpB inoculation, the plants were transfered in a growth chamber at 26ï¿½C (16 h/8 h light/dark, constant light at 200 ï¿½E s-1 m-2)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19106
protocol.text: Plants were mock inoculated with water and challenged with the virulent GMI1000 strain, 24h later. Time 24h

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19107
protocol.text: Mock inoculation with water and challenged with the virulent GMI1000 strain, 24h later. Samples were harvested 5 days later at the first symptoms appearance.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19108
protocol.text: Plants were root-inoculated by the hrpB strain and challenged by the virulent GMI1000 strain, 24 hours later. Time 24h

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19109
protocol.text: Root-inoculation by the hrpB strain and challenged by the virulent GMI1000 strain, 24 hours later. Samples were harvested 5 days later.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19110
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from frozen tissues using the NucleoSpin RNAII kit (Macherey-Nagel, GmbH&Co.KG, Dï¿½ren, Germany) according to the manufacturerï¿½s recommendations

text: Affymetrix microarray platform of the IGBMC and Gï¿½nopole Alsace-Lorraine (

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19114
protocol.text: RMA normalization (Irizarry et al., 2003) implemented in Bioconductor packages. Expression levels are Log base 2.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-19115
protocol.text: A statistical analysis (pairwise comparison) was performed with the LIMMA package using an empirical Bayes linear modelling approach (Smyth, 2004, 2005) and p-values were adjusted by the Benjamini and Hochberg method which controls the False Discovery Rate (FDR) (Benjamini & Hochberg, 1995).
